location.name: Home
location.description: You are at home, playing a video game on your brand new console, when an intruder barges in through the roof. It's Stinky Monkey, the most cruel console thief in the Universe.

npc.name: Stinky Monkey
npc.about: He looks quite intimidating and stupid at the same time.
npc.riddle: Behold, it is me, Stinky Monkey. I am here to take your precious console, and there is no way of stopping me unless you bring me a freshly made pizza.

location.name: Albert Heijn
location.description: You enter the Albert Heijn. You start going through the aisles when you spot a baby in the trolley holding a can of premade dough.

npc.name: Baby
npc.about: As you get closer you notice that the baby is wearing a tuxedo and in his tiny hand there is can of premade dough.
npc.riddle: Good afternoon, adventure seeker. My name is Nigel and I am a well respected illuminati member. I know you are looking for this can of delicious dough and I will give it to you, if you tell me what English word retains the same pronunciation, even after you take away four of its five letters?
npc.returnDialog: Kind sir, would you mind leaving my personal space now.

location.name: Jumbo
location.description: You enter the Jumbo. But a Jumbo employee is blocking your way.

npc.name: Employee
npc.about: The employee looks tired and irritated. As he is arranging the products on the shelf you can hear him mumbling some incoherent words.
npc.riddle: What do you want now? I don't have time for the meaningless smalltalk. But if you solve this, I'll give you what you came for. Find the four digit number in which the first digit is one fourth of the last digit, the second digit is 6 times the first digit, and the third digit is the second digit plus 3. What is it?
npc.returnDialog: Leave me alone, I have lots of work to do.

location.name: Dirk
location.description: You enter the Dirk. There is a sneaky looking fox looking out of its hole.

npc.name: Fox
npc.about: Up close the fox looks like it's been chewed up and spit out by a huge blue whale.
npc.riddle: I have a word - PQLKHP. Decipher it. There are only two thing I can tell you: 23 and Caesar's salad.
npc.returnDialog: You now know the secret of the Universe. Go use it!

location.name: Spar
location.description: You enter the Spar. There is a strange homeless man following you around.

npc.name: Homeless man
npc.about: He is lurking behind the meat aisle. What does he want?
npc.riddle: I will leave you alone if you tell me what's the least number of chairs you would need around a table to sit four fathers, two grandfathers, and four sons?
npc.returnDialog: The housing situation in Amsterdam is crazy, am I right?

location.name: Lidl
location.description: You enter the Lidl. A hungry student is frantically running through the store.

npc.name: Hungry student
npc.about: In front of you is a specimen of a tired CS student after an all nighter with a glass jar of olives in his pocket.
npc.riddle: I am almost finished with my assignment, but I just need help with one more question. What is the next number in the sequence: 21 32 54 87 131 x?
npc.returnDialog: Woah! Look at the time, I'm late for my Software Design lecture.

location.name: Park
location.description: You arrive at the local park. In front of you there is a tree and on the tree branch you see a crow.

npc.name: Crow
npc.about: When you look closer you realise it's holding a piece of cheese in its beak.
npc.riddle: *Apparently the crow can't talk but it throws you a folded piece of paper. It says: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?*

location.neighbours: Albert Heijn, Spar, Palace, Lidl, Jumbo

location.name: Market
location.description: You arrive at the Albert Cuyp market. You see a farmer.

npc.name: Farmer
npc.about: This seems to be the only stand selling artichokes. But the farmer doesn't look very friendly.
npc.riddle: I have the best artichokes in town, and if you want to have one you will have to tell me, what word starts with "f" and ends with "u-c-k"?
npc.returnDialog: I'm all out of artichokes my boy, don't bug me anymore.

location.name: Restaurant
location.description: You enter the restaurant you work at. The talking oven is in the corner.

npc.name: Oven
npc.riddle: I see you need your pizza baked. I can make it happen if you tell me what 4-letter word can be written forward, backward or upside down, and can still be read from left to right?
npc.returnDialog: Hurry now, you have to make it to the Palace!

location.name: Palace
location.description: You find yourself in Stinky Monkey's Palace. It's huge. And stinky.

npc.name: Stinky Monkey
npc.about: He's chewing on a table leg, you can see he's real hungry.
